description:
B-Project 2 Episode 12 "CLIMAX EMOTION"
Thanks to Yashamaru`s help, B-PROJECT is able to hold a countdown concert after all.
The members are eager to put on the best possible performance no matter the circumstances, but the problems keep piling up.
B-PROJECT and Tsubasa work together to resolve them one by one. However, when new problems are added to the mix, the concert itself is threatened again...
Source: crunchyroll
